alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Central Greenville; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 6:37AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Franklin, northwestern Elbert, Hart, northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, southwestern Spartanburg, Anderson and northwestern Abbeville Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 637 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Easley to 6 miles south of Carnesville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Anderson, Hartwell, Greenville Downtown, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Homeland Park, Powdersville, Piedmont and Belton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Central Greenville; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
